sourcePackage.title: Texas Instruments AM335x (Beaglebone Black)
sourcePackage.description: This board support package (BSP) is for the Texas Instruments AM335x (Beaglebone Black) board. This BSP contains prebuilt binaries and buildfiles to boot your board with the QNX Neutrino RTOS. In addition, this BSP provides source code for various drivers that you use can build. For documentation to use this BSP, download the user's guide.
